snippet.title: Em8ER Introduces Crodus, Kaiju PRIME!
snippet.description:
What's a mech vs Kaiju game without MASSIVE kaiju?

Until now nobody has seen how large our Kaiju are going to be. We're talking Shadow of the Colossus sized behemoths that rampage through bases in realtime destruction.

For now, enjoy the concept art for the first Kaiju Prime, CRODUS! There are seven primes and one of them will be modeled, animated and featured in our upcoming Kickstarter.

Join our mailing list for free at: Em8ER.com or become a Newcomer Backer or Monthly Patron on our website!

And yes, this is official Em-8ER music by Firefall composer Michael Bross!
